PE_RATIO.prompt: FOR {{TICKER}} AT {{TIME}}, EXTRACT THE PRICE-TO-EARNINGS (P/E) RATIO FROM THE HTML. IF MULTIPLE VALUES EXIST, PICK THE ONE CLOSEST TO {{TIME}}. RETURN ONLY A JSON LIKE {"PE_RATIO": <NUMERIC_VALUE_OR_NULL>}.
PE_RATIO.search: {{TICKER}} stock P/E ratio site:finance.yahoo.com OR site:marketwatch.com after:{{DATE_MINUS}} before:{{TIME}}

EPS.prompt: FOR {{TICKER}} AT {{TIME}}, EXTRACT THE EARNINGS PER SHARE (EPS), PREFERABLY TTM OR MOST RECENT QUARTER. RETURN ONLY A JSON LIKE {"EPS": <NUMERIC_VALUE_OR_NULL>}.
EPS.search: {{TICKER}} EPS earnings per share site:finance.yahoo.com OR site:investing.com after:{{DATE_MINUS}} before:{{TIME}}

DIVIDEND_YIELD.prompt: FOR {{TICKER}} AT {{TIME}}, EXTRACT THE DIVIDEND YIELD. RETURN ONLY A JSON LIKE {"DIVIDEND_YIELD": <NUMERIC_VALUE_OR_NULL>} WITHOUT % SIGN.
DIVIDEND_YIELD.search: {{TICKER}} dividend yield site:finance.yahoo.com OR site:marketbeat.com after:{{DATE_MINUS}} before:{{TIME}}

MARKET_CAP.prompt: FOR {{TICKER}} AT {{TIME}}, EXTRACT THE MARKET CAPITALIZATION AND RETURN IT AS A PURE NUMBER IN USD. RETURN ONLY A JSON LIKE {"MARKET_CAP_USD": <NUMERIC_VALUE_OR_NULL>}.
MARKET_CAP.search: {{TICKER}} market capitalization site:finance.yahoo.com OR site:macrotrends.net after:{{DATE_MINUS}} before:{{TIME}}

BETA_VOLATILITY.prompt: FOR {{TICKER}} AT {{TIME}}, EXTRACT THE STOCK'S BETA VOLATILITY. RETURN ONLY A JSON LIKE {"BETA": <NUMERIC_VALUE_OR_NULL>}.
BETA_VOLATILITY.search: {{TICKER}} stock beta volatility site:finance.yahoo.com OR site:marketwatch.com after:{{DATE_MINUS}} before:{{TIME}}

VOLUME.prompt: FOR {{TICKER}} AT {{TIME}}, EXTRACT THE DAILY TRADING VOLUME. RETURN ONLY A JSON LIKE {"VOLUME": <NUMERIC_VALUE_OR_NULL>}.
VOLUME.search: {{TICKER}} daily trading volume site:finance.yahoo.com OR site:investing.com after:{{DATE_MINUS}} before:{{TIME}}

NEWS_SENTIMENT.prompt: FOR {{TICKER}} AT {{TIME}}, SCAN NEWS HEADLINES AND SUMMARIZE THEIR SENTIMENT AS 2 (VERY_POSITIVE), 1 (POSITIVE), 0 (NEUTRAL), -1 (NEGATIVE), OR -2 (VERY_NEGATIVE). RETURN ONLY A JSON LIKE {"NEWS_SENTIMENT": <NUMERIC_VALUE>}.
NEWS_SENTIMENT.search: {{TICKER}} latest stock news headlines after:{{DATE_MINUS}} before:{{TIME}}

PRICE_TARGET.prompt: FOR {{TICKER}} AT {{TIME}}, EXTRACT THE MOST RECENT ANALYST AVERAGE PRICE TARGET. RETURN ONLY A JSON LIKE {"PRICE_TARGET_USD": <NUMERIC_VALUE_OR_NULL>}.
PRICE_TARGET.search: {{TICKER}} analyst average price target site:finance.yahoo.com OR site:marketbeat.com after:{{DATE_MINUS}} before:{{TIME}}

SHORT_INTEREST.prompt: FOR {{TICKER}} AT {{TIME}}, EXTRACT THE SHORT INTEREST PERCENTAGE OF FLOAT. RETURN ONLY A JSON LIKE {"SHORT_INTEREST_PERCENT": <NUMERIC_VALUE_OR_NULL>} WITHOUT % SIGN.
SHORT_INTEREST.search: {{TICKER}} short interest percentage site:marketbeat.com OR site:finviz.com after:{{DATE_MINUS}} before:{{TIME}}

REVENUE.prompt: FOR {{TICKER}} AT {{TIME}}, EXTRACT THE MOST RECENT QUARTERLY REVENUE. RETURN ONLY A JSON LIKE {"REVENUE_USD": <NUMERIC_VALUE_OR_NULL>}.
REVENUE.search: {{TICKER}} quarterly revenue site:finance.yahoo.com OR site:macrotrends.net after:{{DATE_MINUS}} before:{{TIME}}

NET_INCOME.prompt: FOR {{TICKER}} AT {{TIME}}, EXTRACT THE MOST RECENT QUARTERLY NET INCOME. RETURN ONLY A JSON LIKE {"NET_INCOME_USD": <NUMERIC_VALUE_OR_NULL>}.
NET_INCOME.search: {{TICKER}} quarterly net income site:finance.yahoo.com OR site:macrotrends.net after:{{DATE_MINUS}} before:{{TIME}}

FREE_CASH_FLOW.prompt: FOR {{TICKER}} AT {{TIME}}, EXTRACT THE MOST RECENT FREE CASH FLOW (FCF). RETURN ONLY A JSON LIKE {"FREE_CASH_FLOW_USD": <NUMERIC_VALUE_OR_NULL>}.
FREE_CASH_FLOW.search: {{TICKER}} free cash flow site:macrotrends.net OR site:finbox.com after:{{DATE_MINUS}} before:{{TIME}}

INSTITUTIONAL_OWNERSHIP.prompt: FOR {{TICKER}} AT {{TIME}}, EXTRACT THE INSTITUTIONAL OWNERSHIP PERCENTAGE. RETURN ONLY A JSON LIKE {"INSTITUTIONAL_OWNERSHIP_PERCENT": <NUMERIC_VALUE_OR_NULL>} WITHOUT % SIGN.
INSTITUTIONAL_OWNERSHIP.search: {{TICKER}} institutional ownership site:marketbeat.com OR site:finviz.com after:{{DATE_MINUS}} before:{{TIME}}
